mapper.select: SELECT oi.*, a.id as a_id, a.name as a_name, a.description as a_description, a.category as a_category, a.price as a_price, a.available_quantity as a_available_quantity FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN article a ON oi.article_id = a.id ORDER BY oi.created_at DESC

SELECT oi.*, a.id as a_id, a.name as a_name, a.description as a_description, a.category as a_category, a.price as a_price, a.available_quantity as a_available_quantity FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN article a ON oi.article_id = a.id WHERE oi.id = #{id}

SELECT oi.*, a.id as a_id, a.name as a_name, a.description as a_description, a.category as a_category, a.price as a_price, a.available_quantity as a_available_quantity FROM order_item oi JOIN order_order_item ooi ON oi.id = ooi.order_item_id LEFT JOIN article a ON oi.article_id = a.id WHERE ooi.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item (article_id, ordered_quantity, unit_price, total_price) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{orderedQuantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalPrice})
